title: Rose and the Lost Princess
description: Rose has just begun her magical training―is she ready to rescue a missing princess? Not all magic is used for good… Rose's whole life has changed in a matter of weeks. Once a lonely orphan, now she's an apprentice to the King's chief magician! But as Rose's magical abilities blossom, she's still uneasy about her new powers―and learns the hard way that power often comes at a price. When the Princess vanishes, rumors of dark magic fly through the city, casting doubt and suspicion on everyone with magical powers. Even Rose's friends don't seem to trust her anymore. Now Rose must find the missing girl. Can she shatter the power of an evil magician before all is lost? Praise for Rose : "Magic, mystery, adventure, and friendship―this book has it all."― Books for Kids "One of those pure unqualified delights that I dearly hope folks will read."― A Fuse 8 Production
author: Holly Webb
